task.summary: search filtering added add rough span changing from 2 to 4 columns
sorting(alphabetic || time) last picture setting up as cover
1. design(FAB, ActionBar. Search_field) 2. Generic RecyclerView adapter for both folders and photos 3. Generic activity for both folders and photos
1. design(FAB, ActionBar. Search_field) 2. Generic RecyclerView adapter for both folders and photos 3. Generic activity for both folders and photos
1. Bitmap decoding redesigned 2. Fixed little UI problem
license added to all the files
1. Spinner adapter bug 2. AcPreview BackButton with wide wrapper 3. Tiling mode has deicated icons 4. New Confirm\Cancel icons 5. ActionBar hiding\showig time reduced twice
1. Added custom design: colors, icons 2. Added scrollListener to RecyclerView: hiding keyboard in situation if user wants to scroll with opened keyboard
